title: Civilization Revolution 2 v1.3.0 Android
description:
Civilization Revolution 2 v1.3.0
Requirements: 3.0+
Overview: The sequel to one of the most successful strategy games on mobile is here! Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution 2 challenges players to build a glorious empire that will stand the test of time.


This is the first game in the Civilization catalog to be developed and available exclusively for mobile devices. Civilization Revolution 2 offers mobile strategy fans a brand new 3D presentation and more tactical depth than ever before! Find out if you have what it takes to rule the world!
Key Features:
- New Civilization - Korea
- New Leaders - Lenin the Russian communist, King Sejong king of Joseon
- New Units Ã¢â‚¬â€œ strengthen your military might with brand new combat units including Aircraft Carriers, Jet Fighters and Special Forces.
- New Technology Ã¢â‚¬â€œ race to science supremacy with new technology such as: Lasers, Modern Medicine and Information Technology
- New Buildings & Wonders Ã¢â‚¬â€œ grow and expand your civilization like never before with new buildings and wonders including Nuclear Power Plant, The Red Cross and Silicon Valley
- Enhanced 3D Graphics Ã¢â‚¬â€œ updated 3D graphics taking full advantage of iOS devices graphical capability
- Scenario Challenges - reenact historic events and battles in the Scenario Mode
